of examples: â¢ The Debt Ceiling. The deficit and the debt are real issues, but the "debt ceiling" debate is political posturing. Professor Hamilton recently wrote: Debt ceiling politics If you have a concrete proposal to raise tax revenue or cut spending, then put it on the table.
